Rulings.Tengu:
●If a monster selected by Taunt is moved to the turn player’s side of the field, the turn player can conduct attacks normally without worrying about the effect of Taunt, because without a card effect that allows it, a player cannot attack monsters on his own side of the field.
●If multiple monsters are selected by multiple Taunts, the turn player selects 1 of the monsters selected by Taunt and can attack it.
●If 1 monster is selected by Taunt and another is equipped with Ring of Magnetism, the turn player must attack the monster equipped with Ring of Magnetism if he attacks.

Rulings.Base: 1. If a monster selected by "Taunt" is moved to the turn player's side of the field, the turn player can conduct attacks normally without worrying about the effect of "Taunt", because without a card effect that allows it, a player cannot attack monsters on his own side of the field.\n2. If multiple monsters are selected by multiple copies of "Taunt", the turn player selects 1 of the monsters selected by "Taunt" and can attack it.\n3. If 1 monster is selected by "Taunt" and another is equipped with "Ring of Magnetism", the turn player must attack the monster equipped with "Ring of Magnetism" if he attacks.
